updates.title: New Winter Collection
updates.description: Added 50+ new winter-themed templates including snowflakes, holiday scenes, and cozy winter landscapes. Perfect for the holiday season!

updates.title: Performance Improvements
updates.description: Optimized app performance for smoother coloring experience. Reduced loading times and improved responsiveness on all devices.

updates.title: Enhanced Color Palettes
updates.description: Introduced 10 new premium color palettes with carefully curated color combinations. Unlock them by completing daily challenges!

updates.title: Bug Fixes & Stability
updates.description: Fixed several minor bugs and improved overall app stability. Your coloring experience should now be even smoother.

updates.title: New Auto-Color Modes
updates.description: Added 3 new auto-coloring algorithms: Rainbow, Sunset, and Ocean themes. Watch your artwork come to life with beautiful color schemes!

updates.title: Gallery Improvements
updates.description: Enhanced the gallery feature with better organization, search functionality, and sharing options. Your masterpieces are now easier to find and share!
